attributes.title: OhNo

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a truly disturbing image of Donald Trumps bare orange butt cheeks. After trying to exit out of the image, the app forced me to take a survey on whether or not I had inappropriate tensions towards underage children. If the doesn’t seem wrong to you, then seek therapy. Terrible app. Would not recommend to anyone.
